feed.title: Millenium Blades Wiki - Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters)

entry.title: Aaron G (Character (Co-Op) Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters))
entry.summary: CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | At the start of the game, gain your Mystery set. | During deckbuilding, you must make a separate deck of 12 cards. This is your Mystery Deck. | At any time, swap a card in your binder with a same-SET card in the Store Area. | When the Deckbuilding Phase ends, shuffle your Mystery Deck. || CO-OP TOURNAMENT POWER | You may only play cards from the top of your Mystery Deck. If you can't play a card from the deck, discard it and play a card from your hand. | Once per Tournament, as an Action, pay 5 Dollars to put a Sell Marker on the next card the Boss plays. | As an Action, you may remove a Sell Marker from a card in your or the Boss' tableau to activate one of its Play, Flip, or Score effects immediately.
entry.content:
Aaron G

Source Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters)
Set Aaron G
Cost $0
Card Type Character (Co-Op)
Quantity
Star Rating 0⭐
Element -
Type -
CO-OP DECKBUILDING POWER | At the start of the game, gain your Mystery set. | During deckbuilding, you must make a separate deck of 12 cards. This is your Mystery Deck. | At any time, swap a card in your binder with a same-SET card in the Store Area. | When the Deckbuilding Phase ends, shuffle your Mystery Deck. || CO-OP TOURNAMENT POWER | You may only play cards from the top of your Mystery Deck. If you can't play a card from the deck, discard it and play a card from your hand. | Once per Tournament, as an Action, pay 5 Dollars to put a Sell Marker on the next card the Boss plays. | As an Action, you may remove a Sell Marker from a card in your or the Boss' tableau to activate one of its Play, Flip, or Score effects immediately.
Source Symbol Collusion
References "RNG" pun.
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2019
Count 3

entry.title: Mysterious Alien F (Character Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters))
entry.summary: DECKBUILDING POWER | At the beginning of the Deckbuilding Phase, declare any player your friend. | You can buy cards with your friend's Sell Markers on them for 2 Dollars. | You may give your friend a card at any time. If you do, gain 2 Dollars. || TOURNAMENT POWER | When your friend would clash, you may include yourself in the clash. | When your friend would lose RP, you may lose that RP instead. | The first time each turn your friend gains RP, gain 5 RP. This effect continues to work during Scoring.

entry.title: Mystery Monk (Character Expansion Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters))
entry.summary: Play: Name a TYPE or ELEMENT. Discard cards from the top of the Store or Core deck until you discard a card of that TYPE or ELEMENT. Play that card, put a Sell Marker on it, then discard this card. If the Store or Core deck runs out of cards, this effect ends.
entry.content:

Source Mini Expansion #10 (Extra Characters)
